divs: Sighting DetailsBright orange red object from the NORTH St Pete Beach area to South Pasadena 3 object 5 minutes apart... moving slowly... at first look like a orange red star + then just a round object... we had binoculars... and the objects did get brighter and brighter.... they were under the clouds. We have watched meteors fall and satellites and planes... we know the difference... this was out of our condo 5th floor so we are pretty high up watching out our big windows.... we know the flight patterns of planes and we know helicopters.. This was not those things. AMAZING.
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Pasadena
There were no other sightings in South Pasadena on or around December 24th 2012
Summary: 3 disk 5 minutes apart - red / orange like a sun
